title: Restaurant Mama of Africa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Take-out, African, Eritrean, Ethiopian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. serves meat. All vegetarian dishes are vegan. all dishes come with injerra, a soft pancake-like bread which serves as fork/spoon. Your plates will be constantly refilled with fresh, hot food as long as you want. Cozy, ethnic atmosphere. Located near Marktplatz.
